CHAPTER 280 Tree Authority

280.01Definitions.

280.02Applicability.

280.03Permits.

280.04Specific removal controls and replacement requirements.

280.041Street trees and planting zones.

280.05The Tree Authority.

280.06Monarch Trees.

280.07Care of Monarch Trees and trees on public property.

280.08Abuse or mutilation of protected trees.

280.09Maintenance standards for trees on City-controlled property.

280.10Prohibited trees and shrubs on City property.

280.11Penalties.

280.12Pruning responsibilities.

280.13Responsibility for monitoring Chapter 280 requirements.

280.14Site criteria.

280.15Severability.

CROSS REFERENCES
